raw_body: WEERASINGHE ARTHUR SILVA (Rtd. Deputy Commissioner of Labour),​ beloved husband of late Indrani Weerasinghe,​ loving father of Dr Hemantha,​ Priyanka,​ Piumika and Nishadha,​ loving father-in-law of Dr Sujeewa,​ Adrian,​ Dr Channa and Dilhani,​ darling grandfather of Dr Hashan,​ Portia,​ Rommel,​ Dr Vidura and Chenuki,​ passed away peacefully on 09th October 2023. Remains lie at “The Restpect” Jayarathna Parlour,​ Borella from 8 a.m. on Thursday 12th October. Cortege will leave at 3.30 p.m. for the Funeral Service and Cremation at General Cemetery,​ Borella on Thursday,​ 12th October.064799
